name: Dimpong
description:
Well, there is not much to talk about, you can call this game Pong with pretty graphics, with theme based on the anime Mob Psycho 100. Here are some basic game modes:

Solo mode   

Play against Reigen. Yes, enjoy my crappy AI.

Duo mode      

Play against your friend, if you have any.

Disco mode   

Play against 3 of your friends, again, if you have any.
